tacticulous.tira.ai

Class SimulatedRound

  • java.lang.Object
    • tacticulous.tira.ai.SimulatedRound

  • public class SimulatedRound
extends Object
    Main control class for simulated actions during a simulated round
    Author:
    O

    • Method Detail

      • simulateTurn

        public Action simulateTurn()
        Goes through all the possible action combinations for all units in current game state. May recursively call itself to simulater multiple successive turns.
        Returns:
        null if all units done for the round, otherwise the bestest of all the actions in the whole world (that the AI knows about... hopefully.)

      • getTargetsInRange

        public TacList<AIUnit> getTargetsInRange(Unit terminator,
                                TacList<AIUnit> potentials)
        Checks which enemiee are in unit's range
        Parameters:
        terminator -
        potentials -
        Returns:
        list of all enemiee in unit's range

      • allMovesAndAttacks

        private Action allMovesAndAttacks(AIUnit unit,
                        Action optimal)
        Simulates both moving and attacking during the same turn
        Parameters:
        unit - unit taking the simulated action
        current - optimal action
        Returns:
        the action with highest value, possibly original optimal action

      • checkIfShouldSimulateNextTurn

        public Action checkIfShouldSimulateNextTurn()
        simulated end of turn; may recursively call for a new simulated turn or even new round
        Returns:
        Action with a flipped value of next turn's optimal action, value = 0 if not simulated

      • checkIfSimulatedRoundOver

        public boolean checkIfSimulatedRoundOver()
        checks if simulated round is over
        Returns:
        true if no active or hostile units have actions remaining

      • newRound

        private SimulatedRound newRound()
        begins new simulated round

      • nodeToTile

        private Tile nodeToTile(Node node)
        Converts the nodes from the pathfinding algorithm to tiles
        Parameters:
        node - coordinates from here
        Returns:
        tile with the same X and Y coordinates as the node.

      • swapSides

        private void swapSides()
        swaps active and hostile unit lists if the next turn is also simulated
